L001.message: This extension helps to avoid websites that you do not want to use anymore.

L002.message: The extension is currently paused. You can reactivate it by clicking the pause-icon again. Nevertheless also while paused you can block or unblock websites and setup all your settings.

L006.message: You can easily unavoid this site again by clicking the button below.

L007.message: But you can also simply pause the extension for a while by clicking the pause-button in the upper right corner.

L023.message: Pause the service for a while

L030.message: You don not want to use the website

L032.message: you do not want to use the service

L033.message: you do not want to use the services

L037.message: INFO: This website has various sections.

L038.message: Sometimes it makes sense to just avoid one section of a website. I.e. if you want to use the website but not a special service they provide on that section. (like a webshop)

L040.message:
Had a really bad customer experience./
    Enter your Text here! /They do not treat their workers like I like it./
    Remind yourself!/Takes my time and I don't feel feel better./
 Find yourself a good reason!
L040.description: Use / to separate different entries from each other
